creator: hallbt
title: Make a Ferrofluid Glass Display
description: This project details the steps to create a ferrofluid glass display, where ferrofluid is suspended in water within a glass jar. A magnet is then used to interact with the ferrofluid, creating a visually interesting and interactive effect.
steps: Mix machine oil and magnetic ink in roughly equal parts to create the ferrofluid. Adjust the ratio to achieve the desired viscosity and magnetic response. Use a stir stick to ensure thorough mixing.
Add a small amount of the prepared ferrofluid to a jar filled mostly with water. Too much ferrofluid will cause it to clump together.

Shake the jar to create suspended blobs of ferrofluid. Bring a magnet to the side of the jar and observe how the ferrofluid blobs race towards and converge into a mass that can be manipulated with the magnet.
